list.label: Applicaiton
list.name: application
list.query: show tag values with key="applicationName" WHERE stream='$stream'
list.tagValuesQuery: show tag values with key="applicationName" WHERE stream='$stream' AND applicationType = '$tag'

list.label: ApplicationId
list.name: applicationId
list.query: show tag values with key = "applicationGuid" WHERE stream = '$stream'
list.tagValuesQuery: show tag values with key = "applicationGuid" WHERE stream = '$stream' and applicationName = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: show tag values with key="applicationName" WHERE stream='$stream'
